title: Live STM Cafeteria Rating System
instruction:
Welcome to the Live Rating Cafeteria System

Your feedback is invaluable to us as we strive to enhance our cafeteria. Kindly take a moment to rate your experience STM Cafeteria.
Please rate based on your opinion

★★★★★-Highest Rate
★-Lowest Rate.

Thank you
rating_description_0: Are the Food and Cafe Cleanliness Satisfying?
rating_description_1: How diverse and varied are the food options available?
rating_description_2: How appealing is the visual presentation of the dishes?
rating_description_3: How fresh are the ingredients used in the dishes? Please rate the taste.
rating_description_4: Does the Customer Service here provide good service?
